text: Sushil Jajodia from George Mason University, Fairfax, VA was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for contributions to information security, data protection, and privacy. Jajodia received his PhD from the University of Oregon, Eugene, Oregon. == References == == External links == *Home page Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:George Mason University faculty Category:21st- century American engineers Category:University of Oregon alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sushil Jajodia
